about_the_game:
Step into the MalovModernArt Virtual Museum, a place where modern art comes alive in a world of imagination. Explore our virtual exhibition halls, showcasing 100% accurate replication of artworks. Take your time in our diverse environments, study the details, and enjoy the vibrant colors.

MalovModernArt lets you go beyond the limits of traditional galleries, offering an interactive experience. Zoom in and out, come as close as you want, and engage with the art like never before. Whether you're an art expert or just curious, our virtual museum is accessible anytime, allowing you to explore at your own pace.

Get ready for a constant stream of inspiration as we update our dynamic space with new exhibitions. MalovModernArt celebrates not just the art but the ever-changing world of creativity. Join us in experiencing the blend of art and innovation, right from your VR headset. Immerse yourself in the magic of modern art, where every gaze is a discovery, and every moment is an artistic revelation. Welcome to a world of colors and stories unfolding around you.

content_descriptors.notes: Artists often convey strong emotions through impactful images. Certain paintings may feature nudity, sharp objects, and blood, reflecting intense aspects of the human experience. Please keep this in mind as you explore the collection.

MalovModernArt lets you go beyond the limits of traditional galleries, offering an interactive experience. Zoom in and out, come as close as you want, and engage with the art like never before. Whether you're an art expert or just curious, our virtual museum is accessible anytime, allowing you to explore at your own pace.

Get ready for a constant stream of inspiration as we update our dynamic space with new exhibitions. MalovModernArt celebrates not just the art but the ever-changing world of creativity. Immerse yourself in the magic of modern art, where every gaze is a discovery, and every moment is an artistic revelation. Welcome to a world of colors and stories unfolding around you.
name: MalovModernArt Virtual Museum

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core 3 Ghz+
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, requires motion controllers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core 4 Ghz+
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2070S
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, requires motion controllers

short_description: Explore virtual masterpieces in the mesmerizing MalovModernArt Virtual Museum, where modern art comes to life through your VR headset. Immerse yourself, engage, and be captivated by a world of colors and stories.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
